title: A oes ffurflen Treth Etifeddiant (IHT) wedi cael ei llenwi
hintText: Gallai hyn fod yn adroddiad ystad Treth Etifeddiant neu ffurflen bapur Treth Etifeddiant.
hintTextIHTSubmitted: If you submitted an IHT 400 form, HMRC will send you a letter with the unique probate code you need to complete this probate application. The letter can take up to 20 working days to arrive.
